title: manamE muruganAmam
sahitya:
manamE muruganAmam maravAmal iruppAi


anupallavi

  dhanam onrE sukham tarum enrE karudi anudinamum adai nADi alaindODiDAmal


caraNam    tirindu eTTu dikkum parandu muTTi mOdi tirumbi vandu ninru virumbum onrai nI
siranda virundenru cintikkavE mOham pirandu mati sidari nirainda shOkamurAdu
